Good ol' portal. If you like puzzle games and want to play a Valve classic then this game is for you.

The cake is a lie

Nah for real cool story and gameplay even though some puzzles took a long time to figure out it still is a fun game I really recommend this game even though this game was made in 2011 it is still very good in my opinion.... Yeah I would recommend you to buy it... The story is kind of short but still fun... And there are still community levels which are fun to play... And you can also play in co-op with friends which is fun. So yeah... All and all this game is good and I recommend that you buy it.
50% puzzles and 50% story. I had a great experience and will definitely keep replaying in the future.
I really love this game.  The Portal gun makes for an interesting way to solve puzzles.
Fantastic game with a gripping narrative. If you were a fan of the first game, you won't be disappointed here!
Great gamplay...possibly one of the best thought out games I've ever played.  Similar to Talos -- think before you act!
Portal 2 is a really clever puzzle game with a remarkable story but it is mainly single player. You can play coop but it could be viewed as mediocre. Definitely a good buy

Portal 2 is an amazing game and in my opinion is the best game of the Portal Bundle. I like the addition of co-op because it gives you the ability to work with friends to beat levels.
